name: Nagasaqi-Hexa
tagline: An opensource project on simulation of a MIDI device, Uses Java/JSwing/and cheap optical mouses.
body:
HOME

**Nagasaqi-Hexa** is a very small sized project to develop **MIDI synthesizer** for fun.

It tweaks existing GUI classes and Mouse-listeners to get user input and uses MIDI Synthesizer to generate sounds. Vision is to make maximum out of minimum resources. I future using Multi-Pointer Aware backend, We hope to create a scalable and cheap synthesizer for all.

![In Action - Screenshot](https://github.com/nagasaqi/nagasaqi-hexa/blob/master/Nagasaqi/src/in/nagasaqi/res/Screenshot%20from%202015-09-08%2002:18:41.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
